entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:58 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
